response.overview: A fictionalized account of the last days of Edgar Allan Poe's life, in which the poet is in pursuit of a serial killer whose murders mirror those in the writer's stories.
response.tagline: The only one who can stop a serial killer is the man who inspired him.
response.title: The Raven

titles.title: เจาะแผนคลั่ง ลอกสูตรฆ่า
推理作家ポー 最期の5日間
神探爱伦坡：黑鸦凶杀案
